meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of collectivism.
meanings.sent1: The collectivistic approach values teamwork and collaboration.
meanings.sent2: In collectivistic societies, people prioritize the well-being of the community.
meanings.sent3: The collectivistic ants worked together to build a strong colony.
meanings.sent4: Her collectivistic spirit shone brightly in the group project.
meanings.sent5: The collectivistic mindset fosters unity and harmony among members.

meanings.definition: Tending to emphasize the importance of the group over the individual.
meanings.sent1: A collectivistic culture values group achievements more than individual success.
meanings.sent2: The collectivistic ideology promotes solidarity and mutual support.
meanings.sent3: The collectivistic penguins huddled together for warmth in the cold.
meanings.sent4: His collectivistic leadership style inspired a sense of belonging in the team.
meanings.sent5: The collectivistic perspective highlights the strength found in unity.
